short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect and organize notes, images, webpages, and videos into a personal knowledge base.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✅ Save Everything with One Click:  Effortlessly capture text, links, images, videos, and files directly from your browser.
✅ Instant Summaries:  Get quick, AI-powered summaries of any link, including YouTube videos, for essential insights.
✅ Chat with Your Memos:  Explore, revisit, and unlock new connections by chatting directly with your saved content.
✅ All-in-One Content Hub:  Organize and manage your favorite content—notes, media, and files—in one convenient place.
✅ Boost Productivity:  Leverage AI to transform how you collect, organize, and explore knowledge.
